txt.en: The tower winch has been destroyed
Do not allow the tower winch to be destroyed

Goblins are swarming to one of the towers on the Deeping Wall. They plan to cause havoc by disabling the siege equipment prepared for use against their vast army. Aid the Rohirrim in securing the supplies, the winch, and the tower itself, from the threat of the vandals.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Crate of siege supplies destroyed

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Winch mechanism damaged
<rgb=#FF0000>The door to the Hornburg has been damaged</rgb>
You have succeeded in defending the siege tower
Defend the tower from the waves of goblins ([placeholder]/8)

The Rohirrim need aid in protecting the materials within the siege towers from the vandals ascending the wall. Protect the winch and supply crates from armed powder kegs and prevent allied guards from falling before the blows of the enemy.
